name: Legacy QuidProQuo Document
summary: A QUID file is a text document created by Scratchware QuidWriter (formerly QuidProQuo), a simple word processor for Windows. It is similar to an .RTF file, containing text that may be formatted in several different styles, such as bold type, italics, page color, different fonts , and font sizes. Scratchware replaced QUID files with .QPQD files in 2024 when it released QuidWriter.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
